com.att.research.xacml.std

Class StdMutableResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.StdMutableResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Response
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JaxpResponse

    public class StdMutableResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements Response
    Mutable implementation of the Response interface.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdMutableResponse()
      Creates a new StdMutableResponse with no Results.
      StdMutableResponse(java.util.Collection<Result> listResults)
      Creates a new StdMutableResponse with a copy of the Results in the given Collection>
      StdMutableResponse(Response copy)
      Creates a new StdMutableResponse that is a copy of the given Response.
      StdMutableResponse(Result resultIn)
      Creates a new StdMutableResponse with a single Result.
      StdMutableResponse(Status status)
      Creates a new StdMutableResponse with a single Result defined by the given Status.

      Adds a Result to this StdMutableResponse>
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      Implementations of this interface must override the equals method with the following semantics: Two Responses (r1 and r2) are equal if: r1.getResults() is pairwise equal to r2.getResults()

      Gets the Collection of Results objects in this Response.

      • getResults

        public java.util.Collection<Result> getResults()
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Gets the Collection of Results objects in this Response. If there are no Results, this method must return an empty Collection.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Implementations of this interface must override the equals method with the following semantics: Two Responses (r1 and r2) are equal if: r1.getResults() is pairwise equal to r2.getResults()
